titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require the use of Federally insured intermediaries for nonrecognition treatment on like-kind exchanges involving cash to be used to acquire the replacement property.
1031 Regulation Act of 2007
1031 Regulation Act of 2007

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1031 Regulation Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require the use of a federally insured depository institution or credit union to hold cash to be used in a tax-free exchange of properties to acquire like-kind property.
